name: Mozilla Firefox
description: Mozilla Firefox is an open-source web browser developed by Mozilla. Firefox has been the second most popular browser since January, 2018.

name: Google Chrome
description: Google Chrome is a web browser developed by Google, released in 2008. Chrome is the world's most popular web browser today!

name: Microsoft Edge
description: Microsoft Edge is a web browser developed by Microsoft, released in 2015. Microsoft Edge replaced Interned Explorer.
